sentences.en: At the end of the first trimester, the fetus is about three inches long.
sentences.cn: 在怀孕的第三个月末，胎儿差不多有三英寸长了。

sentences.en: Conclusion Single serum CA 125 is valuable in predicting pregnancy outcome of first - trimester threatened abortion.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨血清CA125水平在预测早期先兆流产妊娠预后的价值.

sentences.en: E . Second trimester education. Discomforts include backache, round ligament pain, constipation, and indigestion.
sentences.cn: 中孕教育. 不适感包括背痛, 圆韧带疼痛, 便秘及消化不良.

sentences.en: First trimester bleeding may signal a possible miscarriage or ectopic pregnancy.
sentences.cn: 妊娠早期出血可能是流产或宫外孕的迹象.

sentences.en: Meth - ods 3 cases of fulminant hepatitis in the third trimester of pregnancy were analyzed retrospectively.
sentences.cn: 方法回顾性分析本院3例妊娠晚期合并重症肝炎的病例资料.

sentences.en: Mothers who are infected may spirochetes to fetuses in the third trimester, resulting in congenital syphilis.
sentences.cn: 晚期妊娠患者可传播给胎儿, 从而使新生儿患先天性梅毒.

sentences.en: Objective : To study the efficacy of rivanol in combination with mifepristonetermination of mid trimester of pregnancy.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨利凡诺与米非司酮联合用于中期妊娠引产的临床效果.

sentences.en: ObjectiveTo study the therapy for fulminant hepatitis occurring in the third trimester of pregnancy.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨妊娠晚期合并重症肝炎的产科治疗.

sentences.en: She was okay with letting you fly in your third trimester?
sentences.cn: 勤斓　辄婕腔庵　论　　沧?膻砩獗?

sentences.en: Some women experience morning sickness during the first trimester of pregnancy.
sentences.cn: 有些妇女在怀孕的头三个月里,早上有恶心感.

sentences.en: This is a 33 - year - old , primigraida, with a normal first trimester screening.
sentences.cn: 患者,33 岁, 初产妇, 早期妊娠时检查未看到异常.

sentences.en: This is a second trimester fetus and uterus.
sentences.cn: 图示中期妊娠的胎儿及子宫.

sentences.en: To make routine inspection on stock material andes report it trimester.
sentences.cn: 定期检查包料库存并统计.

sentences.en: Treatment during the third trimester to prevent transmission to the newborn may be considered.
sentences.cn: 在怀孕第三期间对新出生实施治疗防止新生儿传染也许应该考虑.
